clear_cache.name: Clear Cache
clear_cache.description: Removes all locally cached TTS audio files created from Chime TTS

say.name: Say
say.description: Play an audio file before TTS audio

chime_path.name: Chime Path
chime_path.description: A preset or custom audio file to be played before TTS audio

end_chime_path.name: End Chime Path
end_chime_path.description: A preset or custom audio file to be played after TTS audio

delay.name: Delay
delay.description: Delay (ms) between the chime/s and the TTS message

final_delay.name: Final Delay
final_delay.description: Final delay (ms) added to the end of the audio

tts_platform.name: TTS Platform
tts_platform.description: TTS platform used to generate TTS audio

tts_playback_speed.name: TTS Playback Speed
tts_playback_speed.description: Playback speed of the TTS audio, between 100% - 200%

volume_level.name: Volume Level
volume_level.description: The volume to use when playing audio

join_players.name: Join Players
join_players.description: Play the audio simultaneously on media_players (that support speaker groups)

cache.name: Cache
cache.description: Whether or not to save the generated audio file in a local cache

announce.name: Announce
announce.description: Stops current media during the announcement and then resume (on supported devices)

language.name: Language
language.description: The TTS language (suppored by Google Translate, Microsoft Edge TTS and Nabu Casa Cloud TTS)

tld.name: TLD
tld.description: The dialect Domain (suppored by Google Translate)

gender.name: Gender
gender.description: Use a male or female voice (suppored by Nabu Casa)
